Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to entitle retired members of the armed forces employed for the Junior Reserve Officers' Training Corps to recompute their retired or retainer pay taking into consideration such employment and to allow such retired members to treat certain amounts as active duty allowances for all purposes.

summary.text: Entitles retired members of the armed forces employed by the Junior Reserve Officers' Training Corps to recompute their retired or retainer pay based on such employment and to treat any amounts received for such employment as an allowance.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to entitle retired members of the armed forces employed for the Junior Reserve Officers' Training Corps to recompute their retired or retainer pay taking into consideration such employment and to allow such retired members to treat certain amounts as active duty allowances for all purposes.
